author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
DINDIGUL

Gandhigram Rural Institute : Department of Hindi, International Mother Tongue day celebrations, S. Natarajan, Vice-Chancellor of the University presides, Silver Jubilee Hall, 3 p.m.

VIRUDHUNAGAR

Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology : Two-day workshop on Career Guidance and Entrepreneurship, V.N.R.T. Gurusamy Nadar Rajammal Memorial Conference Hall, 9.30 a.m.

SIVAKASI

Ayya Nadar Janaki Ammal College: Staff development programme on Intellectual Property Rights, Conference Hall, 10.30 a.m.
title: Dindigul Today for Feb 22
